title: Giant's Belt upcoming change
body: Finally, Giants Belt will be an advanced item built from Ruby Crystal. Now HP has a much more forgiving and universal build path!  Thank you!

replies.body: Next stop, fix {{item:3022}}'s build path pls Riot.
Cinderhulk vs Giant Belt put the Giant Belt into a very under position, I think so that the Giant Belt need a cost reduction to 950g
